name: Night At The Orphanarium
description:
Welcome to the Night At The Orphanarium!

The Orphanarium is under attack by vampires! As Headmistress Susan Brinsley, grab an axe, fell some trees for wooden stakes, and kill the vampires before they steal all the orphans into the night!

Controls:
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Click: Chop/Stab
  • Esc/P: Pause
Credits:
  • Juliestrator — Art
  • Steve McStevenson — Programming
  • Michael Aranda — Music Composition, Sound Design, and Programming
  • Drew Jackson — Guitar and Synth
Screenshots:

Thanks for playing our game!
